fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player to participate in a party game during the day.
- Determine a punishment for the loser(s) of the game. There's no need for prizes, because there are never any winners.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the following night, all one chosen players will be roleblocked, and be put in a public channel with each other (themselves). A random game of the following pool will be announced:
> - Getting Over It
> - Jump King
- The target must complete the selected game in its entirety to be able to escape the Rage Game Host's grasps. The night will not end until the target completes the game. GIM will be stalled indefinitely.
- After 6 hours, all players get access to the channel the target is in, and may pressure the target into completing the game faster, since they *specifically* are holding everyone up.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: You know what you have to do.
